# FEK v5.3

* "Blacklist" feature restored
* "Thread Highlighting" feature restored
* FEK Permissions reduced, for more info see [this post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/VZXIG5LR-fek-version-52?show=flat&comment=00520001)
* Avatars and colored votes should now always appear when switching pages in a thread
* Removed some annoying alert messages such as, "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!" that were used for testing but weren't removed last time

[Click here for Chrome users](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/forum-enhancer-kit/pkcbgkipbiepadbkcgfnekolkklmenoh)

[Click here for Firefox users](https://tundrafizz.space/bek-firefox.xpi)

[Click here for Opera users](https://tundrafizz.space/bek-opera.crx)

Safari version coming soon.

---

# **IMPORTANT!**

If you use an adblocking extension (such as Adblock, Adblock Plus, uBlock Origin), you will need to whitelist leagueoflegends.com

I know this is an annoying extra step, but I'm going to be seeing if I can find a solution to it.

---

Known bug is the text looks strange in Firefox. This will be fixed in the next update.
